title: Capstone Project  - My School
question:
Background Information

Design and code an app to display the following information about your school:
1. School name
2. Location of your school
3. A landmark near your school
4. Directions to your school
5. Strength of students in each grade

Project objective

The objective of the project is to design an app that displays relevant information about your school on pressing certain buttons.
The app should comprise the following features:
1. Display your school name upon pressing the School Name button.
2. Display the location of your school upon pressing the Location button.
3. Display any landmark near your school upon pressing the Landmark button.
4. Display the directions to your school from your house upon pressing the Directions button.
5. Display the number of students in each grade in your school, using lists, upon pressing the Strength of the school button. Make your app look attractive by adding a suitable background color and modifying the properties of the buttons.

Requirements

Here are the milestones you need to achieve to finish this project



Additional challenges

Change the background color of the screen every time a button is pressed in your app
